channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-40341|2024-10-08T18:32:10.012Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20blue%20ocean%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin 1.27.5 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL, capturing GitHub credentials associated with an attacker-specified job.
